summary: Okay, so Thanos destroyed half of the population.  We know Karen ‘died’ when Peter ashed.  Probably means Friday is still...
body: Okay, so Thanos destroyed half of the population.  We know Karen ‘died’ when Peter ashed.  Probably means Friday is still there.  But what about DUM-E and U?  I’m just imagining one of them sitting in the lab freaking the fvck out because his brother is now ash.  *sob*

excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 9/9
Fandom: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
Rating: Explicit
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
Additional Tags: Minor Violence, Angst Lite, Panic Attacks, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Abandonment Issues, Alternate Universe - Merpeople, Arc Reactor Issues, Implied/Referenced Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Alcohol, Events of IM1 Discussed, Kissing, (oh my), Guilt, Nightmares, Tony Stark Still Has Arc Reactor, And Then He Doesn’t, Separations, Pining, explicit sex in the last chapter, see that chapter for all other warnings, think of this as like castaway but with bucky as wilson
Series: Part 3 of Tony Stark Bingo 2019
Summary:

For the Tony Stark Bingo 2019
Squares filled:
S1: Shipwrecked (Ch 1)
R5: Desert Island (Ch 2)
K3: Merpeople (Ch 3)
S5: Carnival (Ch 4)
A1: Arc reactor angst (Ch 5)
A2: Infinity gems (Ch 6)
R3: Science and Magic (Ch 7)
K1: Shapeshifters (Ch 8)
S2: Heat fic (Ch 9)

Pepper and Rhodey join forces against Tony and force him to take some time away from SI after Stane and the palladium poisoning incident. So, for his vacation, Tony gets his yacht and takes it out on the open ocean all by himself. He has to get over his ‘thing’ with water, after all. Only then, there’s a storm…

summary: Of Course I'm Happy To See You - scribblywobblytimeylimey - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
body:
Of Course I’m Happy To See You - scribblywobblytimeylimey - The Avengers (Marvel Movies) [Archive of Our Own]

“Yeah, Steve, sure, but you don’t even know what that means? And you’ve never even heard the term ‘rim job’?”

“Shocking, given that I spend so much time around you,” Steve grumbled. “Let me guess. It’s something sexual?”

“‘Is it something sexual’. God, your vocab, I swear. I bet you say ‘oh golly gosh darn’ when you come.”

I cackled through the whole thing. Amazing.

reblog.comment:

summary:
I just woke up from a dream that was something like:
Steve, Bucky, Sam and maybe Thor? swimming in probably huge lake...to...
body:
I just woke up from a dream that was something like:

Steve, Bucky, Sam and maybe Thor? swimming in probably huge lake…to something…(well it was a dream so I don’t know every detail)

Sam: What? Tony Stark?

Bucky: Yeah definitely just “friends”…(stops swimming and makes air quotes)

Bucky: Right? Punk! (Turns around and pushes Steve underwater)

Steve: (Gets his head out of water with happiest laught I ever heard from him)

Sam: ???

Steve: (Gives cheeky one-armed shrug and continues to swim while smiling like a loon)

Bucky: You’ll see…

They all starts to swim again.

Then I thought OMG they are making Stony official in Avengers: Endgame. They are making it canon! Then I woke up…

I’m going back to sleep to try for self-induced continuation…

Peter: i wonder what happen on the after life 
Tony: you need to die to find out
Peter: oh ok...well the only thing i can do is...
body:
Peter: i wonder what happen on the after life

Tony: you need to die to find out

Peter: oh ok…well the only thing i can do is to kill my self

Tony: peter no! But…i can do it my self and then i will tell you what happen

Peter: no m.stark! But i can do it my self

The avengers : stop !

Guardians of the galaxy: this is not ok!

blog.name: theoncomingeastwindstormer-1027
blog.title: Just Me
blog.description: Random rants about several fandoms and my boring life

title: Tony
body:
I feel like nobody is talking about how terrifying it is for Tony to be stranded in space running out of air. He has PTSD from the first time he was in space and yet when the world needed him to go back out there he didn’t hesitate. He was certain he’d die that time, and he was certain he’d die this time too because he told Peter it’s a one way ticket. 

And now he knows he doesn’t stand a chance, but we know he does, we know he comes back. When he does though, how will he cope with the panic attacks starting up again? How will he cope with the nightmares of watching everyone turn to dust? 

He must be so afraid that he’s going to die as soon as the air runs out, but that little spark of hope that tells him he’ll make it must be far more terrifying, because then he has to live with everything that’s happened, and how does he do that?

reblog.comment:
I feel like nobody is talking about how terrifying it is for Tony to be stranded in space running out of air. He has PTSD from the first time he was in space and yet when the world needed him to go back out there he didn’t hesitate. He was certain he’d die that time, and he was certain he’d die this time too because he told Peter it’s a one way ticket. 

And now he knows he doesn’t stand a chance, but we know he does, we know he comes back. When he does though, how will he cope with the panic attacks starting up again? How will he cope with the nightmares of watching everyone turn to dust? 

He must be so afraid that he’s going to die as soon as the air runs out, but that little spark of hope that tells him he’ll make it must be far more terrifying, because then he has to live with everything that’s happened, and how does he do that?
